sqlMap.select:
SELECT '$clock$' as "clock", ITEMCODE as "itemcode", ITEMNAME as "itemname", a.MONITORID as "monitorid", a.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid", DEPARTMENT_NAME as "departmentname", a.PROCEDUREID as "procedureid", PROCEDURE_NAME as "procedurename", DISCHARGEID as "dischargeid", LICENCEID as "licenceid", ISTOTAL as "istotal", ISTAX as "istax", PKID as "pkid", TAXSOURCECODE as "taxsourcecode", YOUZUZHI as "youzuzhi", D.SITENAME as "portname"
FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_ITEM a left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_PROCEDURE b ON a.PROCEDUREID=b.PROCEDURE_ID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DEPARTMENT C ON a.DEPARTMENTID=C.DEPARTMENT_ID left join ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE D ON a.PKID=D.SITEID WHERE 1=1
CLOCK = SUBSTR(#clock#,1,4)
a.MONITORID = #monitorid#
a.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
a.PROCEDUREID = #procedureid#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
youzuzhi = #youzuzhi#
$orderBy$
ITEMCODE asc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_ITEM WHERE 1=1
CLOCK = #clock#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#

YOUZUZHI = #youzuzhi#, DISCHARGEID = #dischargeid# WHERE CLOCK =#clock# AND ITEMCODE = #itemcode#

SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID as "departmentId", DEPARTMENT_NAME as "departmentName", PARENTID as "parentid", DESCRIPTION as "description", LEVEL as "level", SORT as "sort", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_ha_department where 1=1
DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId#
level = #level#

totalplan = #totalplan#
$orderBy$
DEPARTMENT_ID asc
select max(itemcode) from ${hbSchema}.t_hd_taxandtotal_item where clock=#clock# and departmentid=#departmentid# and itemcode like '$departmentid$%'

select itemname as "valueformat", itemcode as "formulavalue", '$sourceid$' as "propertycode" from ${hbSchema}.t_hd_depart_input_item where istotal='1'
departmentid = #departmentid#
itemname like '%$seek$%'
$orderBy$
itemcode asc

select distinct siteid||'_'||factorid as "formulavalue", sitename||factorname as "valueformat", '$sourceid$' as "propertycode" from ${hbSchema}.view_t_ha_site_factor where 1=1
sitename||factorname like '%$seek$%'
factorid =#factorid#
isonline =#isonline#
isartificial =#isartificial#
$orderBy$
siteid||'_'||factorid asc

SELECT DISCHARGEPORTID as "dischargeportid", DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "dischargeportname", PROCID as "procid", MONITORID as "monitorid", b.DEPARTMENTID as "departmentid" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_ha_dischargeport a left join ${hbSchema}.t_ha_procedure b on(a.procid=b.procedure_id) WHERE a.status='1' and a.ISFORMAL='1'
DISCHARGEPORTID = #dischargeportid#
b.DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid#
a.PROCID = #procedureid#
monitorid = #monitorid#
$orderBy$
DISCHARGEPORTID asc

select t1.siteid as "siteid", t1.sitename as "sitename", t2.procid as "procid", t1.monitorid as "monitorid", t2.DEPARTID as "departmentid" from ${hbSchema}.t_ha_site t1 left join ${hbSchema}.t_ha_dischargeport t2 on t1.portid = t2.dischargeportid where t1.status ='1'
t2.DEPARTID = #departmentid#
t2.procid = #procedureid#
(t1.monitorid = #monitorid# or t1.classifyid = #monitorid#)
t1.siteid = #siteid#
$orderBy$
t2.DEPARTID,t1.siteid
